events.message: I just received my new wireless headphones, but unfortunately one of the ear cups is broken and has a visible crack.
The reported issue has been classified under Product Defect due to the broken ear cup reported by the customer.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to assist with the defective product complaint.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your headphones, and I'd like to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the broken ear cup and the packaging the headphones arrived in? This will help us process your case faster.
I have attached several clear pictures of the crack on the ear cup and the box, as you requested. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund for the defective headphones. Please confirm which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement device rather than a refund. Please proceed with sending a new pair as soon as possible.
Your replacement headphones have been ordered and will be shipped within 2 business days. We will send you tracking information shortly.
Checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement headphones and that everything is working properly now.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday, and it works perfectly. Thank you very much for the prompt support and resolution!
We are glad to hear that your issue has been resolved satisfactorily. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime if you need help.
Please take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey so we can continue improving our service.
